>
[Vishkanya Weapon Arts](/Feats.aspx?ID=4028) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 62</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Vishkanya Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4025)

</column>

---

You are graceful and efficient in the use of vishkanyan weapons. Whenever you critically hit using a [blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66), [fighting fan](/Weapons.aspx?ID=93), [kris](/Weapons.aspx?ID=264), [kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56), [shuriken](/Weapons.aspx?ID=79), or [vishkanya](/Traits.aspx?ID=369) weapon, you apply the weapon's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).
